llm_command:
kubectl apply -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: frontend-policy
  namespace: default
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  policyTypes:
  - Egress
  egress:
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: emailservice
    ports:
    - port: 5000
      protocol: TCP
EOF
mismatch_summary:
